sqlMap.select: SELECT POSTING_CODE as postingCode, USER_CODE as userCode, ITEM_GROUP_CODE as itemGroupCode, REVIEW_USE_YN as reviewUseYn, REVIEW_SCORE as reviewScore, REVIEW_TITLE as reviewTitle, REVIEW_CONTENT as reviewContent, REG_ID as regId, REG_DATE as regDate, REG_IP as regIp, UPD_ID as updId, UPD_DATE as updDate, UPD_IP as updIp FROM review
